text: Ta shuo:â€œWo de zongzu a! Nimen gaosu wo ba, ruguo wo shi yiju cong wo de zhu jiang shi de mingzheng de, er ta ceng jiang ta de jiamei de jiyang shangcile wo,(nandao wo ken weibei ta de mingling ma?) Wo bu yuan he nimen beidao'erchi, wo jinzhi nimen fanzui, wo jiu bu fanzui, wo zhi yuan jin wo suo neng congshi de gaige, wo de chenggong quan ping an la de yuanzhu, wo zhi tuo kao ta, wo zhi guiyi ta
